name: moodle-plugins-marketplace
description: Specialized plugins for Moodle multi-version development, server operations, and plugin scaffolding

plugins.name: moodle-dev-pro
plugins.description: Comprehensive Moodle plugin and theme development with Docker multi-version support, accessibility focus, and UX best practices

plugins.name: plugin-forge
plugins.description: Meta-plugin for creating, validating, and testing Claude Code plugins. Scaffolds plugin structure, generates components, validates manifests, and ensures best practices.

plugins.name: server-ops
plugins.description: Server administration, Docker automation, monitoring, and DevOps tasks for multi-version Moodle development environment
